messages.body: Special Agent Ilichy Miracsky of the Foreign Office meets a Princess. And her obligatory financial counselor, Bode Thomas.
messages.raw:
FLOB TIME: 100% RISK FREE

Special Agent Ilichy Miracsky of the Foreign Office meets a Princess. And her obligatory financial counselor, Bode Thomas.

messages.subject: A CRY FOR HELP
messages.body:
Good day and compliment, c,I am writing
 this letter in confidence believing that
 if it is the wish Of God for you to help
 me and my family, God almighty will bless
 and Reward you abundantly. My family and I
 are true Christians and worship's God
 truthfully. I got Your contact through
 Internet during my research on some one
 who could Help us. I am a female student
 Of University of Nigeria, Lagos. I am 22
 yrs old. My fathers died earlier two
 months ago and left my Mother I and my
 brother behind. He Was a king, which our
 town citizens titled him before his death
 I was a Princess to him and I and my
 brother are the only people who Can take
 Care of his wealth now because my mother
 is not literate enough To know all my
 fathers wealth behind. He left up to USD
 2,350,000,000.00 million dollaTwo million
 three hundred and fifty dollars] with a
 security Company, and I dont know how and
 what I will do to invest this money
 Somewhere in abroad, so that!
 my fathers kindred will not take over what
 Belongs to my father and our family, which
 they were planning to do Without my
 present because I am a female as stated by
 our culture in the Town. That is why I
 felt happy when I saw your contact which I
 strongly believe that by the grace of God,
 you will help me secure And invest this
 money. I thereby need your help in
 bringing the box Containing the money out
 from the security company. Based on your
 reply I Will furnish you with more details
 on how we can proceed. I am ready to pay
 20% of the total amount to you if you help
 us in Securing this money and another 10%
 interest of Annual Income to you, for
 investing this money for us, which you
 will strongly have absolute Control Over.
 If you can handle this project sincerely
 and also willing to assist me In lifting
 this fund, kindly reach me and I will let
 you know the next Step to take towards
 actualizing this transaction as quickly as
 Possible. Please, not!
 e that this transaction is 100% risk free.
 I look forward hearing fr
 om you soonest. Yours sincerely, Princess
 and family.
messages.raw:
PRINCESS JOY

From: "princess joy" <princess01@kitemail.com>
To: Ilichy
Subject: A CRY FOR HELP
Date: 12.4.2004 - 19:37:09

Good day and compliment, c,I am writing this letter in confidence believing that if it is the wish Of God for you to help me and my family, God almighty will bless and Reward you abundantly. My family and I are true Christians and worship's God truthfully. I got Your contact through Internet during my research on some one who could Help us. I am a female student Of University of Nigeria, Lagos. I am 22 yrs old. My fathers died earlier two months ago and left my Mother I and my brother behind. He Was a king, which our town citizens titled him before his death I was a Princess to him and I and my brother are the only people who Can take Care of his wealth now because my mother is not literate enough To know all my fathers wealth behind. He left up to USD 2,350,000,000.00 million dollaTwo million three hundred and fifty dollars] with a security Company, and I dont know how and what I will do to invest this money Somewhere in abroad, so that! my fathers kindred will not take over what Belongs to my father and our family, which they were planning to do Without my present because I am a female as stated by our culture in the Town. That is why I felt happy when I saw your contact which I strongly believe that by the grace of God, you will help me secure And invest this money. I thereby need your help in bringing the box Containing the money out from the security company. Based on your reply I Will furnish you with more details on how we can proceed. I am ready to pay 20% of the total amount to you if you help us in Securing this money and another 10% interest of Annual Income to you, for investing this money for us, which you will strongly have absolute Control Over. If you can handle this project sincerely and also willing to assist me In lifting this fund, kindly reach me and I will let you know the next Step to take towards actualizing this transaction as quickly as Possible. Please, not! e that this transaction is 100% risk free. I look forward hearing fr om you soonest. Yours sincerely, Princess and family.

 Please i have been expecting to receive
 your mail.

 account through online banking method.
 
 Send your number to me so that I could call
 you for more relative details.
 
 Best regards
 
 Princess

messages.subject: FINAL  ARRANGEMENTS FOR TRANSFER ON
messages.body:
Dear Ilichy Miracsky, 

Thanks for your mail. Princess has greeted you, she is very glad
and  happy with your association.

All legal necessary arrangements are currently going on as
regards  transfer of the funds US$2.350Million to you for
investment in your  country.

Please note, before the funds are transferred to you, all legal 
documentations must be properly completed for security and
general interest of  both parties concerned. In view of this, you
are advised to forward the  following details.                   
                                   1) Your bank details, where
the fund will be transferred. 2) your 
contact address. 3) Your international passport as
identification. 

Upon receipt of these details we shall complete necessary 
documentations, in this regard and as well forward agreement of
understanding which  shall abide and guide you and princess.

Send through email. You can as well call me 2348033329040

Thanks

Bode Thomas
messages.raw:
BODE THOMAS (the Princess's "banker" and true male alter go)

From: "Bode Thomas" <b_thomas001@yahoo.com>
Subject: FINAL ARRANGEMENTS FOR TRANSFER ON
Date: 5.5.2004 - 12:14:03

Dear Ilichy Miracsky,

Thanks for your mail. Princess has greeted you, she is very glad and happy with your association.

All legal necessary arrangements are currently going on as regards transfer of the funds US$2.350Million to you for investment in your country.

Please note, before the funds are transferred to you, all legal documentations must be properly completed for security and general interest of both parties concerned. In view of this, you are advised to forward the following details.
1) Your bank details, where
the fund will be transferred. 2) your
contact address. 3) Your international passport as
identification.

Upon receipt of these details we shall complete necessary documentations, in this regard and as well forward agreement of understanding which shall abide and guide you and princess.

Send through email. You can as well call me 2348033329040

Thanks

Bode Thomas

messages.subject: FINALIZATION ON THE WAY, BANK DETAILS
messages.body:
Attn: Ilichy Miracsky


Sir,

The subject matter referred. We confirm receipt of your mail with
required details. Thanks for your concern and cooperation in this
regard.

Urgent necessary legal arrangements are on the way as regards
finalization. As soon as documentations completed, we shall
forward an agreement of understanding which shall abide and guide
both parties.

Then we shall notifiy you to contact the Bank for release of the
fund to you without further delay. There much indications that
Princess may send a representative down to your country for
meeting with you. 

Call me on 234-8033329040 for more clarifications.

 

Best regards

Bode Thomas

messages.subject: Immediate action Important and Urgent
messages.body:
Attn: Mr.Ilichy Miracsky,
 
Sir,

Be properly infomred, due to urgency attached, further
delay is not good in this regard.

We have succeeded in getting Affidavit of claim from
Federal High Court, again an agreement of
understanding and our letter of request for
consultancy and endorsement fees total $1,900.00 are
hereby attached for your immedate action.

We intend to finish up this matter by Monday next
week, and take the file from Oceanic Trust Bank down
to Achor Trust Bank PLC so that the funds will be
transferred to you. Therefore send the money as
advised.

Do call on 234-8033329040

Thanks

Yours Very Truly,

Bode Thomas
messages.raw:
BODE THOMAS

We intend to finish up this matter by Monday next week, and take the file from Oceanic Trust Bank down to Achor Trust Bank PLC so that the funds will be transferred to you. Therefore send the money as advised.

Do call on 234-8033329040

Thanks

Yours Very Truly,

Bode Thomas

messages.body:
Dear Ilichy Miracsky,
 
 Be properly infomred, due to urgency 
 attached, further delay is not good in
 this regard.
 
 It is very necessary/urgent you send the
 $1900 with the information in my earlier
 mail so that by Monday the entire
 endorsement will be made on your behalf.
 
 Do send the money through Wester Union
 Money Transfer with the details in my
 earlier mail and forward the pay slip to
 me as soon as possible. 
 
 I advise you to send your mobile phone
 number or alternative number where I can
 reach you to me, and advise on how to dial
 the number to get you. Add your country
 code to enable me dial and reach you for
 more relative discussion.  
 
 Upon receipt of the payment slip the
 endorsement will be successfully executed
 on Monday.
 
 My number remain, 234 80 33329040
 
 Yours very truly,
 
 Bode Thomas
messages.raw:
BODE THOMAS

Date: 16.5.2004 - 17:07:07

Dear Ilichy Miracsky,

Be properly infomred, due to urgency attached, further delay is not good in this regard.

It is very necessary/urgent you send the $1900 with the information in my earlier mail so that by Monday the entire endorsement will be made on your behalf.

Do send the money through Wester Union Money Transfer with the details in my earlier mail and forward the pay slip to me as soon as possible.

I advise you to send your mobile phone number or alternative number where I can reach you to me, and advise on how to dial the number to get you. Add your country code to enable me dial and reach you for more relative discussion.

Upon receipt of the payment slip the endorsement will be successfully executed on Monday.

My number remain, 234 80 33329040

Yours very truly,

Bode Thomas
